channel.title: dod_snow_fight_arena
channel.description:
[url]https://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/138440[/url]
A winter remake of the popular dod_orange_fight_arena by yahan. Here is the new stuff!:
-Added a basic spawn protection -HDR -New, more fitting textures -Middle flag requires 2 players -Added more cover here, and there -Added cover for Allied 2nd flag -Flag printnames in English, not German -Snow -Soundscape -Tweaked skybox -New light
If you encounter the problem that the snow has pink and black checkers in it, open the console, type in "buildcubemaps" and restart the game. A map made for fun and the looks. Map build time: About 6 hours.
Contact me if you have any trouble or bug reports. Oh and one more thing: If you own a server, would you be so kind to put this map in the server list? I would gladly see if the players like it!
_________________________________________________________________
Do you guys like it? :slight_smile:

item.title: dod_snow_fight_arena
item.dc:creator: ErikKiller
item.description:
For a devmap it is actually very good from half the shit that floats around DoDs.
I take it it’s for gungame? I hope your map gets in the maplist because the snow and light settings are quite brilliant.
But I agree with the rest of the guys, try to make a realistic looking map next. You have a very solid gungame map there but try to make a realistic snow map out of it. I’m sure it’ll look really great.

Read full topic

item.title: dod_snow_fight_arena
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
ashton93:

Dude, my intention was never to make a realistic map. Do it yourself

Unless you are going for an over the top map it is generally a good idea to go with theme of the game you are mapping for. Your map just falls into a bland middle point. If I was looking for maps I would certainly over look your map, it looks unfinished an unrefined.

The fact is you making a map for a semi-realistic WWII game. Make the map look like a fucking WWII setting.

Read full topic

item.title: dod_snow_fight_arena
item.dc:creator: Savant
item.description:
this is not a real map, real maps look something like this

not like this

that’s not a battlefield, that’s not even a map, it’s just a cluster of corners, cover and sniping position. just because it has a .bsp and a few spawn points doesn’t mean it’s a map, it’s horror, and everyday more and more people make these horrors instead of spending quality 50 hours making a map that’s going to be played and enjoyed.

googling “World war 2 towns” takes about 5 minutes, including saving photos to your computer
making a basic design on paper or photoshop can take up to 10 hours
in the meantime you’re assembling something that looks like a map
getting response from the community takes even more time
finally texturing and applying proper models to the map, making displacements and optimizing takes about 10 more hours
and another wave of bug fixes, exploits etc. takes even more

all that time spent is rewarded with a perfectly made map, and even (if valve turns it’s eyes towards dod :s again) included in some of the future updates

but no lets make a “map” post it and reject any criticism you received, and even in this case, stuff like this is also criticism

It’s pretty ugly ,do real maps, not orange ones…

so yeah. Make real maps, not orange/white stuff with random props

Read full topic
